docs.lead_paragraph: The Message of the Governor of Texas has been delayed by the ill-health of His Excellency and the dilatory reports of the Departments. The Legislature has accordingly stood still. The Message has just reached us.
docs.snippet: The Message of the Governor of Texas has been delayed by the ill-health of His Excellency and the dilatory reports of the Departments. The Legislature has accordingly stood still. The Message has just reached us.
